comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: Admiral Bogan at celebration in honor of U.S.S Saratoga. Plaque reads, "U.S.S saratoga Named for Saratoga No. 2 1814-1825. September 11 1814 Flagship of Capt. Thomas Macdonough U.S.N. in Battle of Lake Chaplain."
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
